title: Hextech Crating / Loot system FIXES!!! (repost for lazy people)
body:
Like many of you, i logged in yesterday to be filled with joy at the release of Hextech Crafting / Loot systems only to find i had never ending issues trying to open my chest or access the Hextech crafting / loot tab! After 28h of issues, no reply from ticketing Riot i decided to do my own research and go through multiple forums and potential issues. Here's what i found to fix my issues.

Adobe Air! For alot of you whom have bought a laptop in the last 10months or so with Windows 10, you may be shocked to realize. Your system may still run LoL, but it is a game which uses adobe air support. Be sure you have this installed on your system!

Adobe Air Link: https://get.adobe.com/air/

Internet Settings: You may or may not have this already done, when i compared i found my settings didn't match Riots request of how it should be set up... Do the following

Control Panel > Internet Options > Advanced > Scroll down to security > Be sure that these two boxes are checked! "Use SSL 3.0 and TSL 1.0"

As a windows 10 user, i double checked to make sure my service pack was up to date (it was!)

These are the 3 issues i found where my system didn't match Riots recommendations. Once i changed these, i have received my Hextech Chest and loot, opened and received my skin (Heartseeker{{champion:22}}   )

Now get back into your games once you've made sure these settings and adobe air is installed have been done and enjoy your Hextech release!

Happy games ahead community!
